text:
Patrick Jason Faber (born 21 March 1978) is a Belizean politician. He is currently the Leader of the Opposition. He formerly was Minister of Education, Youth Sports and Culture.
In July 2020 he was appointed the leader of the United Democratic Party, after Prime Minister Dean Barrow stated his plans to retire at the end of his term.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Education, Youth Sports and Culture
